# Do-Re-Ci-Pe

Do-Re-Ci-Pe is an iOS app that acts as a "kitchen sidekick," helping users cook with what they have.

## Key Features

- **Photo Scanning:** Users can snap photos of their fridge, pantry, receipts, or cookbooks. The app uses AI to recognize ingredients instantly.
- **Smart Recipe Generation:** Generates personalized recipes based on detected ingredients, dietary preferences, and available time.
- **Kitchen Tools:** Includes cooking timers, technique tips, and substitution suggestions.
- **Organization:** Allows users to save favorites, plan meals for the week, and generate shopping lists.

## Technical Details

- **Platform:** iOS (iPhone/iPad)
- **Pricing:** 
    - DO Plan: $4.99 (50 credits)
    - RE Plan: $1.99/month (unlimited)
    - MI Plan: $7.99/year (unlimited)
- **Website:** https://dorecipe.app
- **Support:** support@dorecipe.app
